DOC.brief_summary: This study do find use botulinum toxin prior medium strength combination chemical peel ( Jessner 's peel follow 35 % Trichloroacetic acid peel ) improve appearance crow 's foot wrinkle compare chemical peel alone . Botulinum toxin type A purified substance , derive bacteria block muscular nerve signal . Jessner 's Peel , combination resorcinol ( 14g ) , salicylic acid ( 14g ) , lactic acid ( 85 % ) ethanol ( 95 % ) , superficial chemical peel . These two products/procedures FDA approve improve appearance facial wrinkle .
DOC.brief_title: Lateral Canthal Rhytides With Medium Depth Chemical Peel With Without Pretreatment With Botulinum Toxin A
DOC.detailed_description: Wrinkling skin cause habitual facial expression , age , sun damage , smoking , poor hydration , various factor . There two major type wrinklesâ€”dynamic static . Dynamic wrinkle , due excessive muscle activity , usually face , tend disappear relax facial muscle . The common dynamic wrinkle frown line , forehead wrinkle , eye wrinkle ( crow 's foot ) . However , excessive muscle activity carry long , disappear completely relaxation , thus call static wrinkle . Static wrinkle form either chronic excessive muscle activity due effect age gravity , loss subcutaneous fat . Examples static wrinkle nasolabial fold , deep groove run side nose corner mouth .
DOC.criteria: Age 30 75 year old In good health Has static dynamic lateral canthal wrinkle ( `` crow 's foot '' ) Has willingness ability understand provide inform consent communicate investigator Pregnant lactating Has receive follow treatment : botulinum toxin injection past 6 month ablative laser procedure past 6 month radiofrequency device treatment past 6 month ultrasound device treatment past 6 month medium deep chemical peel past 6 month temporary soft tissue augmentation material past year semipermanent soft tissue augmentation material past 2 year permanent soft tissue augmentation material Is plan receive within next 3 month , cosmetic procedure ( chemical peel , botulinum toxin injection , ablative nonablative laser procedure , filler injection , radiofrequency procedure , dermabrasion , ultrasound face lift procedure ) Has active infection face ( exclude mild acne Has history neuromuscular disorder Has allergy albumin Has allergy Aquaphor AND petroleum jelly Has history bleed disorder Is unable understand protocol give inform consent Has mental illness
